codeSnippets.createSnippetDescription: Add a new custom code snippet to your website.
codeSnippets.deleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the code snippet "{name}"? This action cannot be undone and the code will be removed from your website.
codeSnippets.description: Add, edit, and manage custom JS or CSS code snippets injected into the website frontend.

form.codeDescription: Enter your JavaScript or CSS code.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly explain what this snippet does
form.nameDescription: Give this snippet a recognizable name.
form.pathsDescription: Specify on which page paths this snippet should be active. Use * as wildcard. Leave empty for all pages.
form.pathsPlaceholder:
One path pattern per line, e.g.:
/products/*
/about
/ (for homepage)
form.statusDescription: Controls whether this snippet is active on the frontend.

isEnabled.description: If disabled, the task won't run on schedule or be triggerable via API.
